name: Study Buddies Dev Page
tagline: Dynamic and responsive website development for Study Buddies
body:
### Welcome to the Developmental Page of the Study Buddies Official Website.
This page is the update log for the work-in-progress website Study Buddies. The website is created using the Codeigniter framework and Bootstrap 3.x.

### Development Log
25.01.2015  
Fourth + Fifth commit:  
Admin Panel  
  Tables display  
  News Table Edit/Delete  
Language switch  
Populated about page  
  
22.01.2015  
Third commit: added Login + Sign up system.  
List of amendments:  
Updated Homepage Jumbotron (banner, temporary)  
Updated footer  
  corrected 'Budddies' -> 'Buddies'  
  added privacy, disclaimer (just words)  
Updated Sign in page  
  Make Agree button more visible  
  Updated Terms & Conditions  
  
06.01.2015  
Second commit: added templates on about page.  
  
05.01.2015  
First commit on this repository.

### Live Demo
**[Click here](http://http://sb1234test.freeiz.com)**

***

### Authors and Contributors
In 2014, JM (@johnhorsema) started this project.

### Support or Contact
Have any suggestions or found and problems? Feel free to email me at <jjmace01@gmail.com>.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
